name: preprocesscanine
label: ldogStruct: anatomical pre-processing for the LDOG project
description: This gear performs preprocessing for the LDOG project.
author: Ozenc Taskin

centre_of_gravity_x.description: x position of the center voxel. If two structurals are used, obtain the coordinates from the second structural input (MPRAGE_02)

centre_of_gravity_y.description: y position of the center voxel. If two structurals are used, obtain the coordinates from the second structural input (MPRAGE_02)

centre_of_gravity_z.description: z position of the center voxel. If two structurals are used, obtain the coordinates from the second structural input (MPRAGE_02)

number_of_threads.description: Number of threads to use for registrations

Template.description: Template image to use for warping. This is optional. If left empty, the gear uses the invivoTemplate
